GK19kragh_pu:301: kathaṃ nu śakyo 'nunayo maharṣer viśrāṇanāc cānyapayasvinīnām /
GK19kragh_pu:302: imām anūnāṃ surabher avehi rudraujasā tu pahṛtaṃ tvayāsyām // Ragh_2.54 //
GK19kragh_pu:303: seyaṃ svadehārpaṇaniṣkrayeṇa nyāyyā mayā mocayituṃ bhavattaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:304: na pāraṇā syād vihatā tavaivaṃ bhaved aluptaś ca muneḥ kriyārthaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:305: bhavān apīdaṃ paravān avaiti mahān hi yatnas tava devadārau /
GK19kragh_pu:306: sthātuṃ niyoktur na hi śakyam agre vināśya rakṣyaṃ svayam akṣatena //
GK19kragh_pu:307: kim apy ahiṃsyas tava cen mato 'haṃ yaśaḥśarīre bhava me dayāluḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:308: ekāntavidhaṃsiṣu madvidhānāṃ piṇḍeṣv anāsthā khalu bhautikeṣu // Ragh_2.57
GK19kragh_pu:309: saṃbandham ābhāṣaṇapūrvam āhur vṛttaḥ sa nau saṃgatayor vanānte /
GK19kragh_pu:310: tad bhūtanāthānuga nārhasi tvaṃ saṃbandhino me praṇayaṃ vihantum //
GK19kragh_pu:311: tatheti gām uktavate dilīpaḥ sadyaḥ pratiṣṭambhavimuktabāhuḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:312: sa nyasta śastro haraye svadeham upānayat piṇḍam ivāmiṣasya // Ragh_2.59
GK19kragh_pu:313: tasmin kṣaṇe pālayituḥ prajānām utpaśyataḥ siṃhanipātam ugram /
GK19kragh_pu:315: uttiṣṭha vatsety amṛtāyamānaṃ vaco niśamyotthitam utthitaḥ san /
GK19kragh_pu:316: dadarśa rājā jananīm iva svāṃ gām agrataḥ prasraviṇīṃ na siṃham //
GK19kragh_pu:317: taṃ vismitaṃ dhenur uvāca sādho māyāṃ mayodhbhāvya parīkṣito 'si /
GK19kragh_pu:318: ṛṣiprabhāvān mayi nāntako 'pi prabhuḥ prahartuṃ kim utānyahiṃsrāḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:319: bhaktyā gurau mayy anukampāya ca prītāsmi te putra varaṃ vṛṇīṣva /
GK19kragh_pu:320: na kevalānāṃ payasāṃ prasūtim avehi māṃ kāmadughāṃ prasannām // Ragh_2.63
GK19kragh_pu:322: vaṃśasya kartāram anantakīrtiṃ sudakṣiṇāyāṃ tanayaṃ yayāce // Ragh_2.64 //
GK19kragh_pu:323: saṃtānakāmāya tatheti kāmaṃ rājñe pratiśrutya payasvinī sā /
GK19kragh_pu:324: dugdhvā payaḥ pattrapuṭe madīyaṃ putr' opabhuṅkṣv' eti tam ādideśa //
GK19kragh_pu:325: vatsasya homārthavidheś ca śeṣam ṛṣer anujñām adhigamya mātaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:326: ūdhasyam icchāmi tavopabhoktumyaṃ ṣaṣṭhāmśam urvyā iva rakṣitāyāḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:327: itthaṃ kṣitīśena vasiṣṭhadhenur vijñāpitā prītatarā babhūva /
GK19kragh_pu:328: tadanvitā haimavatāc ca kukṣeḥ pratyāyayāv āśramam aśrameṇa // Ragh_2.67
GK19kragh_pu:329: tasyāḥ prasannendumukhaḥ prasādaṃ gurur nṛpāṇāṃ gurave nivedya /
GK19kragh_pu:330: praharṣacihnānumitaṃ priyāyai śaśaṃsa vācā punaruktayeva // Ragh_2.68 //
GK19kragh_pu:332: papau vasiṣṭhena kṛtābhyanujñaḥ śubhraṃ yaśo mūrtam ivātitṛṣṇaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:334: tau daṃpatī svāṃ prati rājadhānīṃ prasthāpayām āsa vaśī vasiṣṭhaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:335: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya hutaṃ hutāśam anantaraṃ bhartur arundhatīṃ ca /
GK19kragh_pu:336: dhenuṃ savatsāṃ ca nṛpaḥ pratasthe sanmaṅgalodagrataraprabhāvaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:338: yayāv anudghātasukhena mārgaṃ sveneva pūrṇena manorathena // Ragh_2.72 //
GK19kragh_pu:340: netraiḥ papus tṛptim anāpnuvadbhir navodayaṃ nātham ivauṣadhīnām //
GK19kragh_pu:341: puraṃdaraśrīḥ puram utpatākaṃ praviśya paurair abhinandyamānaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:342: bhuje bhuaṃgendrasamānasāre bhūyaḥ sa bhūmer dhuram āsasañja // Ragh_2.74
GK19kragh_pu:343: atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotir atrer iva dyauḥ surasarid iva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtam aiśam /
GK19kragh_pu:344: narapatikulabhūtyai garbham ādhatta rājñī gurubhir abhiniviṣṭaṃ lokapālānubhāvaiḥ // Ragh_2.75
GK19kragh_pu:346: nidānam ikṣvākukulasya saṃtateḥ sudakṣiṇā daurhṛdalakṣaṇaṃ dadhau //
GK19kragh_pu:348: tanuprakāśena viceyatārakā prabhātakalpā śaśineva śarvarī // Ragh_3.2 //
GK19kragh_pu:349: tato viśāṃpatyur ananyasaṃtater manorathaṃ kiṃcid ivodayonmukham /
GK19kragh_pu:350: ananyasauhārdarasasya dohadaṃ priyā prapede prakṛtipriyaṃvadā // Ragh_3.2A
GK19kragh_pu:353: tadānanaṃ mṛtsurabhi kṣitīśvaro rahasy upāghrāya na tṛptim āyayau /
GK19kragh_pu:354: karīva siktaṃ pṛṣataiḥ payomucāṃ śucivyapāye vanarājipalvalam // Ragh_3.3
GK19kragh_pu:355: divaṃ marutvān iva bhokṣyate bhuvaṃ digantaviśrāntaratho hi tat sutaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:356: ato 'bhilāṣe prathamaṃ tathāvidhe mano babandhānyarasān vilaṅghya sā //
GK19kragh_pu:357: na me hriyā śaṃsati kiṃcid īpsitaṃ spṛhāvatī vastuṣu keṣu māgadhī /
GK19kragh_pu:358: na hīṣṭam asya tridive 'pi bhūpater priyāsakhīr uttarakosaleśvaraḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:359: upetya sā dohadaduḥkhaśīlatāṃ yad eva vavre tad apaśyad āhṛtam /
GK19kragh_pu:360: na hīṣṭam asya tridive 'pi bhūpater abhūd anāsādyam adhijyadhanvanaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:361: krameṇa nistīrya ca dohadavyathāṃ pracīyamānāvayavā rarāja sā /
GK19kragh_pu:363: dineṣu gacchatsu nitāntapīvaraṃ tadīyam ānīlamukhaṃ stanadvayam /
GK19kragh_pu:366: nadīm ivāntaḥsalilāṃ sarasvatīṃ nṛpaḥ sasattvāṃ mahiṣīm amanyata //
GK19kragh_pu:368: yathākramaṃ puṃsavanādikāḥ kriyā dhṛteś ca dhīraḥ sadṛśīr vyadhatta saḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:371: kumārabhṛtyākuśalair anuṣṭhite bhiṣagbhir āptair atha garbhabharmaṇi /
GK19kragh_pu:372: patiḥ pratītaḥ prasavonmukhīm priyāṃ dadarśa kāle divam abhrītam iva //
GK19kragh_pu:373: grahais tataḥ pañcabhir uccasaṃśrayair asūryagaiḥ sūcitabhāgyasaṃpadam /
GK19kragh_pu:374: asūta putraṃ samaye śacīsamā trisādhanā śaktir ivārtham akṣayam //
GK19kragh_pu:375: diśaḥ prasedur maruto vavuḥ sukhāḥ pradakṣiṇārcir havir agnir ādade /
GK19kragh_pu:376: babhūva sarvaṃ śubhaśaṃsi tatkṣaṇaṃ bhavo hi lokābhyudayāya tādṛśām //
GK19kragh_pu:377: ariṣṭaśayyāṃ parito visāriṇā sujanmanas tasya nijena tejasā /
GK19kragh_pu:378: niśīthadīpāḥ sahasā hatatviṣo babhūvur ālekhyasamarpitā iva // Ragh_3.15
GK19kragh_pu:380: adeyam āsīt trayam eva bhūpateḥ śaśiprabhaṃ chattram ubhe ca cāmare //
GK19kragh_pu:381: samīkṣya putrasya cirān mukhaṃ pitā nidhānakumbhasya yuveva durgataḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:382: mudā śarīre prababhūva nātmanaḥ payodhir indūdayamūrchito yathā //
GK19kragh_pu:383: nivātapadmastimitena cakṣuṣā nṛpasya kāntaṃ pibataḥ sutānanam /
GK19kragh_pu:384: mahodadheḥ pūra ivendudarśanād guruḥ praharṣaḥ prababhūva nātmani //
GK19kragh_pu:385: sa jātakarmaṇy akhile tapasvinā tapovanād etya purodhasā kṛte /
GK19kragh_pu:386: dilīpasūnur maṇir ākarodbhavaḥ prayuktasaṃskāra ivādhikaṃ babhau //
GK19kragh_pu:388: na kevalaṃ sadmani māgadhīpateḥ pathi vyajṛmbhanta divaukasām api //
GK19kragh_pu:389: na saṃyatas tasya babhūva rakṣitur visarjayed yaṃ sutajanmaharṣitaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:390: ṛṇābhidhānāt svayam eva kevalaṃ tadā pitḥṇāṃ mumuce sa bandhanāt //
GK19kragh_pu:391: śutasya yāyād ayam antam arbhakas tathā pareṣāṃ yudhi ceti pārthivaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:392: avekṣya dhātor gamanārtham arthavic cakāra nāmnā raghum ātmasaṃbhavam //
GK19kragh_pu:393: pituḥ prayatnāt sa samagrasaṃpadaḥ śubhaiḥ śarīrāvayavair dine dine /
GK19kragh_pu:394: pupoṣa vṛddhiṃ haridaśvadīdhiter anupraveśād iva bālacandramāḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:395: umāvṛṣāṅkau śarajanmanā yathā yathā jayantena śacīpuraṃdarau /
GK19kragh_pu:396: tathā nṛpaḥ sā cu sutena māgadhī nanandatus tatsadṛśena tatsamau //
GK19kragh_pu:397: rathāṅganāmnor iva bhāvabandhanaṃ babhūva yat prema parasparāśrayam /
GK19kragh_pu:398: vibhaktam apy ekasutena tat tayoḥ parasparasyopari paryacīyata //
GK19kragh_pu:399: uvāca dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyām avalambya cāṅgulim /
GK19kragh_pu:400: abhūc ca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā pitur mudaṃ tena tatāna so 'rbhakaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:401: tam aṅkam āropya śarīrayogajaiḥ sukhair niṣiñcantam ivāmṛtaṃ tvaci /
GK19kragh_pu:402: upāntasaṃmīlitalocano nṛpaś cirāt sutasparśarasjñatāṃ yayau // Ragh_3.26
GK19kragh_pu:403: tam aṅkam āropya śarīrayogajaiḥ sthiter abhettā sthitimantam anvayam /
GK19kragh_pu:404: svamūrtibhedena guṇāgryavartinā patiḥ prajānām iva sargam ātmanaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:405: sa vṛttacaulaś calakākapakṣakair amātyaputraiḥ savayobhir anvitaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:406: liper yathāvadgrahaṇena vāṅmayaṃ nadīmukheneva samudram āviśat //
GK19kragh_pu:407: athopanītaṃ vidhivad vipaścito vininyur enaṃ guravo gurupriyam /
GK19kragh_pu:408: avandhyayatnāś ca babhūvur arbhake tatāra vidyāḥ pavanātipātibhir //
GK19kragh_pu:409: dhiyaḥ samagraiḥ sa guṇair udāradhīḥ kramāc catasraś caturarṇavopamāḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:410: tatāra vidyāḥ pavanātipātibhir diśo haridbhir haritām iveśvaraḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:411: tvacaṃ sa medhyāṃ paridhāya rauravīm aśikṣatāstraṃ pitur eva mantravat /
GK19kragh_pu:412: na kevalaṃ tadgurur ekapārthivaḥ kṣitāv abhūd ekadhanurdharo 'pi saḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:413: mahokṣatāṃ vatsataraḥ spṛśann iva dvipendrabhāvaṃ kalabhaḥ śrayann iva /
GK19kragh_pu:414: raghuḥ kramād yauvanabhinnaśaiśavaḥ pupoṣa gāmbhīryamanoharaṃ vapuḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:415: athāsya godānavidher anantaraṃ vivāhadīkṣāṃ niravartayad guruḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:416: narendrakanyās tam avāpya satpatiṃ tamonudaṃ dakṣasutā ivābabhuḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:418: vapuḥprakarṣād ajayad guruṃ raghus tathāpi nīcair vinayād adṛśyata //
GK19kragh_pu:419: tataḥ prajānāṃ ciram ātmanā dhṛtāṃ nitāntagurvīṃ laghayiṣyatā dhuram /
GK19kragh_pu:420: nisargasaṃskāravinīta ity asau nṛpeṇa cakre yuvarājaśabdabhāk // Ragh_3.35
GK19kragh_pu:422: agacchad aṃśena guṇābhilāṣiṇī navāvatāraṃ kamalād ivotpalam // Ragh_3.36
GK19kragh_pu:423: vibhāvasuḥ sārathineva vāyunā ghanavyapāyena gabhastimān iva /
GK19kragh_pu:424: babhūva tenātitarāṃ suduḥsahaḥ kaṭaprabhedena karīva pārthivaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:425: niyujya taṃ homaturaṃgarakṣaṇe dhanurdharaṃ rājasutair anudrutam /
GK19kragh_pu:426: apūrṇam ekena śatakratūpamaḥ śataṃ kratūnā apavighnam āpa saḥ // Ragh_3.38
GK19kragh_pu:427: tataḥ paraṃ tena makhāya vajvanā turaṃgam utsṛṣṭam anargalaṃ punaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:428: dhanurbhṛtām agrata eva rakṣiṇāṃ jahāra śakraḥ kila gūḍhavigrahaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:429: viṣādaluptapratipatti vismitaṃ mamaiva yeneha turaṃgam īkṣase /
GK19kragh_pu:430: dhenvā niśamyeti vacaḥ samīrtaṃ śrutaprabhāvā dadṛśe 'tha nandinī //
GK19kragh_pu:431: svedāmbunā mārjaya putra locane mamaiva yeneha turaṃgam īkṣase /
GK19kragh_pu:432: dhenvā niśamyeti vacaḥ samīritaṃ mudaṃ parām āpa dilīpanandanaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:433: tadaṅganisyandajalena locane pramṛjya puṇyena puraskṛtaḥ satām /
GK19kragh_pu:434: atīndriyeṣv apy upapannadarśano babhūva bhāveṣu dilīpanandanaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:435: sa pūrvataḥ parvatapakṣaśātanaṃ dadarśa devaṃ naradevasaṃbhavaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:436: punaḥ punaḥ sūtaniṣiddhacāpalaṃ harantam aśvaṃ ratharaśmisaṃyatam //
GK19kragh_pu:437: sa pūrvataḥ parvatapakṣaśātanaṃ hariṃ viditvā haribhiś ca vājibhiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:438: avocad enaṃ gangaspṛśā raghuḥ svareṇa dhīreṇa nivartayann iva // Ragh_3.43
GK19kragh_pu:439: makhāṃśabhājāṃ prathamo manīṣibhis tvam eva devendra sadā nigadyase /
GK19kragh_pu:441: trilokanāthena sadā makhadviṣas tvayā niyamyā nanu divyacakṣuṣā /
GK19kragh_pu:442: sa cet svayaṃ karamasu dharmacāriṇāṃ tvam antarāyo bhavasi cyuto vidhiḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:443: tad aṅgam agryaṃ maghavan mahākrator amuṃ turaṃgaṃ pratimoktum arhasi /
GK19kragh_pu:444: pataḥśruter darśayitāra īśvarā malīmasām ādadate na paddhatim // Ragh_3.46
GK19kragh_pu:445: iti pragalbhaṃ raghuṇā samīritaṃ vaco niśamyādhipatir divaukasām /
GK19kragh_pu:446: nivartayām āsa rathaṃ savismayaḥ pracakrame ca prativaktum uttaram //
GK19kragh_pu:447: yad āttha rājanyakumāra tat tathā yaśas tu rakṣyaṃ parato yaśodhanaiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:448: jagatprakāśaṃ tad aśeṣam ijyayā bhavadgurur laṅghayituṃ mamodyataḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:449: harir yathaikaḥ puruśottamaḥ smṛto maheśvaras tryambaka eva nāparaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:450: tathā vidur māṃ munayaḥ śatakratuṃ dvitīyagāmī na hi śabda eṣa naḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:451: ato 'yam aśvaḥ kapilānukāriṇā pitus tvadīyasya mayāpahāritaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:452: alaṃ prayatnena tavātra mā nidhāḥ padaṃ padavyāṃ sagarasya saṃtateḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:453: tataḥ prahasyāpabhayaḥ puraṃdaraṃ punar babhāṣe turagasya rakṣitā /
GK19kragh_pu:454: gṛhāṇa śastraṃ yadi sarga eṣa te na khalv anirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhavān //
GK19kragh_pu:455: sa evam uktvā maghavantam unmukhaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ saśaram śarāsanam /
GK19kragh_pu:457: raghor avaṣṭambhamayena pattriṇā hṛdi kṣato gotrabhid apy amarṣaṇaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:459: dilīpasūnoḥ sa bṛhad (?) bhujāntaraṃ praviśya bhīmāsuraśoṇitocitaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:460: papāv anāsvāditapūrvam āśugaḥ kutūhaleneva manuṣyaśoṇitam // Ragh_3.54 //
GK19kragh_pu:462: bhuje śacīpattraviśeṣakāṅkite svanāmacihnaṃ nicakhāna sāyakam // Ragh_3.55
GK19kragh_pu:463: jahāra cānyena mayūrapattriṇā śareṇa śakrasya mahāśanidhvajam /
GK19kragh_pu:464: cukopa tasmai sa bhṛśaṃ suraśriyaḥ prasahaya keśavyaparopaṇād iva //
GK19kragh_pu:466: babhūva yuddhaṃ tumuulaṃ jayaiṣiṇor adhomukhair ūrdhvamukhaiś ca pattribhiḥ // Ragh_3.57 //
GK19kragh_pu:468: śaśāka nirvāpayituṃ na vāsavaḥ svataś cyutaṃ vahnim ivādbhir ambudaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:470: raghuḥ śaśāṅkārdhamukhena pattriṇā śarāsanajyām alunād viḍaujasaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:471: sa cāpam utsṛjya vivṛddhamatsaraḥ praṇāśanāya prabalasya vidviṣaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:473: raghur bhṛśaṃ vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainikāśrubhiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:474: nimeṣamātrād avadhūya tad vyathāṃ sahotthitaḥ sainikaharṣanisvanaiḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:475: tathāpi śastravyavahāraniṣṭhure bipakṣabhāve ciram asya tasthuṣaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:476: tutoṣa vīryātiśayena vṛtrahā padaṃ hi sarvatra guṇair nidhīyate //
GK19kragh_pu:477: asaṅgam adriṣv api sāravattayā na me tvadanyena visoḍham āyudham /
GK19kragh_pu:478: avehi māṃ prītam ṛte turaṃgamāt kim icchasīti sphuṭam āha vāsavaḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:480: narendrasūnuḥ pratisaṃharann iṣuṃ priyaṃvadaḥ pratyavadat sureśvaram //
GK19kragh_pu:481: amocyam aśvaṃ yadi manyase prabho tataḥ samāpte vidhinaiva karmaṇi /
GK19kragh_pu:482: ajasradīkṣāprayataḥ sa madguruḥ krator aśeṣeṇa phalena yujyatām //
GK19kragh_pu:483: yathā ca vṛttāntam imaṃ sadogatas trilocanaikāṃśatayā durāsadaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:484: tavaiva saṃdeṣaharād viśaṃpatiḥ śṛṇoti lokeśa tathā vidhīyatām //
GK19kragh_pu:485: tatheti kāmaṃ pratiśuśruvān raghor yathāgataṃ mātalisārathir yayau /
GK19kragh_pu:486: nṛpasya nātipramanāḥ sadogṛhaṃ sudakṣināsūnur api nyavartata // Ragh_3.67
GK19kragh_pu:487: tam abhyanandat prathamaṃ prabodhitaḥ prajeśvaraḥ śāsanahāriṇā hareḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:488: parāmṛśan harṣajaḍena pāṇinā tadīyam aṅgaṃ kuliśavraṇāṅkitam // Ragh_3.68
GK19kragh_pu:489: iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ /

GK19kragh_pu:3238: gāndharvam astraṃ tad itaḥ pratīccha prayogasaṃhāravibhaktamantram /
GK19kragh_pu:3239: saṃdhyā prātipadeneva na cārihiṃsā vijayaḥ svahaste // Ragh_5.57* //
GK19kragh_pu:3240: nidrāvaśaṃ tvayi gate śaśinā kathaṃcid ātmānam ānanarucā bhavato viyujya /
GK19kragh_pu:3241: lakṣmīr vibhātasamaye 'pi hi darśanena paryutsukā praṇayinī niśi khaṇḍiteva // Ragh_5.67*
GK19kragh_pu:3242: mandaṃ vivāti himasaṃbhṛtaśītabhāvaḥ saṃsṛjyate sarasijair aruṇāṃśubhinnaiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3243: saurabhyam īpsur iva te mukhamārutasya yan no guṇān prati niśāpariṇāmavāyuḥ // Ragh_5.69*
GK19kragh_pu:3244: iti sa vihatanidras talpam alpetarāṃśaḥ suragaja iva gaṅgāsaikataṃ supratīkaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3245: parijanavanitānāṃ pādayor vyāpṛtānāṃ valayamaṇividiṣṭaṃ pracchadāntaṃ mumoca // Ragh_5.75*
GK19kragh_pu:3247: siṃhāsanasthān nṛpatīn apaśyat yūpān praśastān iva haimavedīn // Ragh_6.1*
GK19kragh_pu:3248: yadā yadā rājakumārikāsau na pūrvapūrvaṃ ganayāṃ cakāra /
GK19kragh_pu:3249: tadā tadā nāmitarepharekhām āśālatā pallavinī babhūva // Ragh_6.67* //
GK19kragh_pu:3252: atha vīkṣya guṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ prakṛtiṣv ātmajam ābhigamikaiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3253: padavīṃ pariṇāmadeśinīṃ raghur ādatta vanāntagāminīm // Ragh_8.9* //
GK19kragh_pu:3255: prāk sṛṣṭe[ḥ] kevalātmane paścād bhad[r]am upeyuṣe // Ragh_10.19* //
GK19kragh_pu:3257: svāṃ sakṣiptatikarkaśaṃ hi tac cikṣipur daśāarathātmajāgrataḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:3258: nistriṃśakalpasya nidher jalānām eṣā tamāladrumarāja nīlā /
GK19kragh_pu:3259: dūrād arālabhru vibhāti velā kalaṅkarekhā malineva dhārā // Ragh_13.15* //
GK19kragh_pu:3260: pratyāgatau tatra cirapravāsād apaśyatāṃ dāśarathī jananyau /
GK19kragh_pu:3262: keyaṃ vane lakṣmaṇa lakṣmaṇeti dīnākṣaraṃ roditi yoṣid uccaiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3263: āṃ jñātam eṣā janakātmajeti kavir vicintyāntikam ājagāma // Ragh_14.69* //
GK19kragh_pu:3264: tad ākarṇya muner vākyaṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3266: gaccha lakṣmaṇa śīghraṃ tvaṃ mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3267: tyāgo vāpi vadho vāpi sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam // Ragh_15.94* //
GK19kragh_pu:3269: kundāgra danto ripudantisiṃhaḥ patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ kulakair ivenduḥ //
GK19kragh_pu:3270: hitvātha bhogāṃs tapasottamena triviṣṭapaṃ prāptavati kṣitīśe /
GK19kragh_pu:3271: tadātmajaḥ sāgaradhīracetāḥ śaśāsa pṛthvīṃ sakalāṃ nṛsomaḥ // Ragh_18.19*
